rows.label: bf05030100_0010
rows.name: Who are you?

rows.label: bf05030100_0020
rows.name:
I am Fan la Norne, envoy for the
Acedian Holy See.

rows.label: bf05030100_0030
rows.name: Oh... from the Holy See?

rows.label: bf05030100_0040
rows.name: You are Rex-sama, am I correct?

rows.label: bf05030100_0050
rows.name:
His Holiness Marveni requests an audience.
Please come with me.

rows.label: bf05030100_0060
rows.name:
You're joking...right? Why would
the Pope want to meet someone like me?

rows.label: bf05030100_0070
rows.name:
The Holy See manages every Blade and
Driver in Alst.

rows.label: bf05030100_0080
rows.name: And as you are the Driver of the Holy Grail...

rows.label: bf05030100_0090
rows.name: ...They want to take that power in.

rows.label: bf05030100_0100
rows.name: Not at all, my lady.

rows.label: bf05030100_0110
rows.name: His Holiness...as a fellow Driver of the Holy Grail,

rows.label: bf05030100_0115
rows.name: would like to speak to Rex-sama.

rows.label: bf05030100_0120
rows.name: That is all.

rows.label: bf05030100_0130
rows.name: His fellow...? You don't mean?!

rows.label: bf05030100_0140
rows.name: Indeed. His Holiness is Metsu's Driver.

rows.label: bf05030100_0150
rows.name: [  ML:undisp   ]  !!

rows.label: bf05030100_0160
rows.name:
There is another matter. I believe you currently have
a certain dagger in your possession?

rows.label: bf05030100_0170
rows.name: You know about that?!

rows.label: bf05030100_0180
rows.name:
Why yes, I can tell.
His Holiness Marveni is its original owner, after all.

rows.label: bf05030100_0190
rows.name: [  ML:undisp   ]  !!

rows.label: bf05030100_0200
rows.name: So the Pope - he's Cole's Driver as well?

rows.label: bf05030100_0210
rows.name: Yes...

rows.label: bf05030100_0220
rows.name: Come off it - just how old is he?!

rows.label: bf05030100_0230
rows.name:
The current Pope is Acedian.
It's not that hard to believe.

rows.label: bf05030100_0240
rows.name: The Acedian do live long lives.

rows.label: bf05030100_0250
rows.name:
Oh right...? Well, that would explain
why Cole-san said the dagger's owner...

rows.label: bf05030100_0260
rows.name: would know how to get to the World Tree!

rows.label: bf05030100_0270
rows.name: Well, what do you say?

rows.label: bf05030100_0280
rows.name: An audience with His Holiness Marveni is an honor.

rows.label: bf05030100_0290
rows.name: Ahh, hey, uhhh... W-wait a second...

rows.label: bf05030100_0300
rows.name:
I wouldn't buy it, Rex.
This is too good to be true.

rows.label: bf05030100_0310
rows.name: What do you think, Hikari?

rows.label: bf05030100_0320
rows.name:
You noticed, right?
As soon as we met Cole-san.

rows.label: bf05030100_0330
rows.name: Yes.

rows.label: bf05030100_0340
rows.name:
Though I had no idea that man had
become the Pope, of all things.

rows.label: bf05030100_0350
rows.name: Should we...?

rows.label: bf05030100_0360
rows.name:
There's a lot I want to ask him.
I want to know about what happened after I went to sleep.

rows.label: bf05030100_0370
rows.name:
And of course... How it is that
you happen to be here, Fan.

rows.label: bf05030100_0380
rows.name: All right, then. I want to meet him too.

rows.label: bf05030100_0390
rows.name: In fact, we might have no other choice.
